info.name: FoodDelivery
info.description: This API powers a food delivery web application for a restaurant chain. It facilitates online ordering, restaurant management, courier assignment, and customer interactions. The system ensures efficient coordination between restaurants, couriers, and customers, with a fixed 15-minute delivery time for all orders

item.description:
Manages food items available on restaurant menus. It allows for adding, updating, retrieving, deleting, and rating food items.

### **Endpoints:**

1. **Add a Food Item (****`POST /foods`****)** – Adds a new food item to a restaurant's menu.
    
2. **Get All Food Items (****`GET /foods`****)** – Retrieves a list of all available food items.
    
3. **Get Food by ID (****`GET /foods/{id}`****)** – Fetches details of a specific food item.
    
4. **Update Food Item (****`PUT /foods/{id}`****)** – Updates the details of an existing food item.
    
5. **Delete a Food Item (****`DELETE /foods/{id}`****)** – Removes a food item from the menu.
    
6. **Rate a Food Item (****`POST /foods/{id}/rate`****)** – Allows users to rate and review a food item.

item.description:
Includes endpoints for handling customer orders. It provides functionality to place orders, retrieve order details, view orders by users, and cancel orders.

### **Endpoints:**

1. **Place an Order (****`POST /orders`****)** – Allows a user to place a new order at a restaurant.
    
2. **Get All Orders (****`GET /orders`****)** – Retrieves all orders made across the restaurant chain.
    
3. **Get Order by ID (****`GET /orders/{id}`****)** – Fetches details of a specific order using its ID.
    
4. **Get Orders by User (****`GET /orders/users/{id}`****)** – Retrieves all orders placed by a specific user.
    
5. **Cancel an Order (****`PUT /orders/{id}/cancel`****)** – Cancels an order if it has not been processed yet.

item.description:
Contains endpoints for managing restaurants. It allows admin to create, update, delete, and retrieve restaurant details. It also includes an endpoint for fetching all orders associated with a restaurant

### **Endpoints:**

1. **Create a Restaurant (****`POST /restaurants`****)** – Adds a new restaurant to the system.
    
2. **Get All Restaurants (****`GET /restaurants`****)** – Retrieves a list of all restaurants.
    
3. **Get Restaurant by ID (****`GET /restaurants/{id}`****)** – Fetches details of a specific restaurant using its ID.
    
4. **Update a Restaurant (****`PUT /restaurants/{id}`****)** – Updates the details of an existing restaurant.
    
5. **Delete a Restaurant (****`DELETE /restaurants/{id}`****)** – Removes a restaurant from the system.
    
6. **Get Orders by Restaurant (****`GET /restaurants/{id}/orders`****)** – Retrieves all orders placed at a specific restaurant.
